section.title: Description
section.p: The amount that was or is to be supplied
"A dimensioned quantity expressing the result of measuring" - HL7 V3

stentry.p: The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM) []. "The unit of measure specified in the Unified Code for Units of Measure (UCUM). The default unit is 1." - HL7 V3
The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit. "The magnitude of the quantity measured in terms of the unit" - HL7 V3
